divs: sighting detailsdriving my full-sized pick-up truck south down 12th st in phx,az at 8:15 pm,i was looking at the air traffic at sky harbor.i saw what i thought was a shooting star about 2\3 from the top of my field of vision.the light stopped it's quick descent to about 1\3 down my field of vision and i clearly saw that it was 3 separate lights in straight sucession and close together.then lights simply disappered.the lights were very bright white.they were definitely between me and the airport, which put them right over downtown phoenix.the sighting was over in 2 seconds.being an avid sky watcher,the lights were definitely anomolous,not pyrotechnics,a blimp, a chopper, etc.i pulled into my driveway 2 minutes later and ran into the street looking for something, anything but it was simply over.
trends: There have been 417 other sightings in Phoenix
There were no other sightings in Phoenix on or around July 27th 2013
